channel.title: Ayahuasca on goodroot
channel.description: Recent content in Ayahuasca on goodroot

item.title: The Hacker Who Drank Ayahuasca
item.description: In the ‘90s, everyone is weird. We are the age-less, culture-less, state-less, God-less generation being raised by the Internet… which is to say, we are raising each other. And the weirdest among us fall into strange places. As for why, the reasons differ: fighting parents, an unusual or unsightly face, too much time, not enough attention, an odd mind, strange hair or too many idiosyncrasies. Some just want to learn the ways of technology and reap its benefits and some just want to play.
